events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but it still hasn't arrived. The tracking info hasn't updated in days, and I am worried it might be delayed or lost.
The customer's message indicates a likely delivery delay as their package has not arrived on time and tracking is stagnant.
The case has been assigned to delivery support specialist Alex to investigate the delayed shipment.
Hello! Thanks for reaching out. I understand your order hasn't arrived yet, and I’m here to help you find out what’s causing the delay.
Could you please confirm your order number and the exact date you placed your order? This will help me track the shipment more accurately.
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and I placed it on May 15th. The tracking number is included on the confirmation email, but it hasn’t changed in days.
Thank you for the info. I have contacted the shipping carrier to clarify the status. Meanwhile, I can offer expedited shipping for a replacement if your package is confirmed lost.
Thanks for looking into this. I appreciate the option for a replacement with expedited shipping if needed. Please let me know what the carrier says.
The carrier confirmed a delay due to transit issues but your package is now out for delivery and should arrive tomorrow. We apologize for the inconvenience.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your order and that everything arrived in good condition. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since the order has been delivered and you have not reported further issues, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience.
